channel.title: GAD: The Prestige [DL The Client][Beta Test As An Admin][One Night Only]
channel.description:
Download: http://uppit.com/p9zq21srwj96/The_Prestige.rar
Guilds and Dungeons: The Prestige. I have nothing to do tonight so for one night only I'm going to let anyone log in as an administrator to mess around and test aspects of the server.
See my development thread for more information on the server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,502671.0.html
Oh, and you must register via the "New User" button when the client is loaded.

item.title: GAD: The Prestige [DL The Client][Beta Test As An Admin][One Night Only]
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Original-Gaming, post:57, topic:406006”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=503002.msg3680761#msg3680761 date=1311515320]

Y U NO HAVE CAPES IN-GAME!!@#!@#!@ #oneee!!!111!!
but seriously, you can’t get to jad, and there isn’t any shops with capes in it.

Because I haven’t put hardly anything in yet. All I done was the Prestige which I found out if one person gets their Prestige updated, you all do… so I must fix that.

Last night we were just spawning shit and PKing each other. It won’t always be like that though. This is just for testing purposes, a one off.
[/quote]

Yea Lmao Im’a Be On Again Today Me You Nd Chris Nd Dan Death Matches :D[/quote]
ima be on too

Read full topic

That makes your client half the size and also leaves just the run and the compiler. :)[/quote]no just jar your class files and give it to them

item.title: GAD: The Prestige [DL The Client][Beta Test As An Admin][One Night Only]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

You can just good decompiler and then get into the class files. Java files should be deleted before upload and class files and the cache should be hidden. That makes your client half the size and also leaves just the run and the compiler.

item.title: GAD: The Prestige [DL The Client][Beta Test As An Admin][One Night Only]
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Asuyuka, post:44, topic:406006”]Heh, putting .class files in the folder named “Classes” isn’t hiding it.

Java files are the ones you should be hiding, leechers are less likely to decompile it.[/quote]Even if you decompile getting it 100% correct are close to none

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:33, topic:406006”][quote author=Shadowspkin link=topic=503002.msg3680115#msg3680115 date=1311475514]
If you need Offshore hosting\VPS\Regular webhosting

Add my MSN- Shadows-pking@hotmail.com

I can help you out I have a really nice place to get them

(Offshore=Nulled scripts)

  (Nulled scripts=Free vB)

[/quote]
=O PM me tomorrow. Can I still edit/develop the server whilst it’s on a VPS?

And a few us have just been pking all night it’s been fun but I keep dying because I’m drunk. Dan is good. Will be on tomorrow night as well now.[/quote]
Ofc, that’s what a vps is for… lol, I belive there are only linux up at the time they might of put windows up last nite.

Read full topic
